name: unity-catalog
description: Export metadata from Databricks Unity Catalog including tables, schemas, and lineage information.
recipe:
source:
  type: unity-catalog
  config:
    workspace_url: "https://your-workspace.cloud.databricks.com"
    access_token: "{{ ACCESS_TOKEN }}"
    catalog: "your-catalog"
    schema: "your-schema"
sink:
  type: datahub-rest
  config:
    server: "http://localhost:8080"

name: semantic-view
description: Export semantic layer metadata and business intelligence views from Snowflake.
recipe:
source:
  type: snowflake-semantic
  config:
    host_port: "your-account.snowflakecomputing.com:443"
    username: "{{ USERNAME }}"
    password: "{{ PASSWORD }}"
    database: "your-database"
    warehouse: "your-warehouse"
sink:
  type: datahub-rest
  config:
    server: "http://localhost:8080"

name: aws-sagemaker
description: Export machine learning models, experiments, and training metadata from AWS SageMaker.
recipe:
source:
  type: aws-sagemaker
  config:
    aws_access_key_id: "{{ AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID }}"
    aws_secret_access_key: "{{ AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY }}"
    aws_region: "us-east-1"
sink:
  type: datahub-rest
  config:
    server: "http://localhost:8080"

name: snowflake
description: Export comprehensive metadata including databases, schemas, tables, and usage statistics from Snowflake.
recipe:
source:
  type: snowflake
  config:
    host_port: "your-account.snowflakecomputing.com:443"
    username: "{{ USERNAME }}"
    password: "{{ PASSWORD }}"
    database: "your-database"
    warehouse: "your-warehouse"
sink:
  type: datahub-rest
  config:
    server: "http://localhost:8080"

name: bigquery
description: Export datasets, tables, views, and lineage information from Google BigQuery.
recipe:
source:
  type: bigquery
  config:
    project_id: "your-project-id"
    key_path: "path/to/service-account-key.json"
sink:
  type: datahub-rest
  config:
    server: "http://localhost:8080"

name: redshift
description: Export tables, views, databases, schemas, and lineage from Amazon Redshift.
recipe:
source:
  type: redshift
  config:
    host: "your-cluster.redshift.amazonaws.com"
    port: 5439
    username: "{{ USERNAME }}"
    password: "{{ PASSWORD }}"
    database: "your-database"
sink:
  type: datahub-rest
  config:
    server: "http://localhost:8080"

name: tableau
description: Export data sources, workbooks, worksheets, and dashboards from Tableau.
recipe:
source:
  type: tableau
  config:
    server: "https://your-tableau-server.com"
    username: "{{ USERNAME }}"
    password: "{{ PASSWORD }}"
    site: "your-site"
sink:
  type: datahub-rest
  config:
    server: "http://localhost:8080"

name: powerbi
description: Export dashboards, tiles, datasets, and lineage from Microsoft Power BI.
recipe:
source:
  type: powerbi
  config:
    tenant_id: "your-tenant-id"
    client_id: "{{ CLIENT_ID }}"
    client_secret: "{{ CLIENT_SECRET }}"
    workspace_id: "your-workspace-id"
sink:
  type: datahub-rest
  config:
    server: "http://localhost:8080"
